about_the_game:
Get more out of the EARTHLOCK: Festival of Magic experience with the complete Hero Pack. Customize your team even further with six new outfits reflecting their inner heroes.

(Please note that this DLC is only compatible with EARTHLOCK: Festival of Magic. The skins are included in the extended version of the game, EARTHLOCK.)

The Hero Pack includes the following outfits:

  • Bandit Amon
  • Princess Ive
  • Shaman Gnart
  • Paladin PAT
  • Konkylian Olia
  • Flamedog Taika

Each character will receive an alternate origin talent which you can swap onto your talent board, unlocking their hero outfit.
